title: SubCircus
blurb: EDM DJ live-streaming platform with SRT/RTMP ingest, multi-destination push, low-latency players, chat overlays, tipping/merch, and archive replays.
description: SubCircus is a DJ-focused live streaming stack. Ingest via SRT/RTMP, transcode/pack into HLS/DASH/LL-HLS, simulcast to multiple platforms, and keep your own origin with archives and analytics. Includes show scheduler, countdowns, setlists/track-ID panels, chat overlay, tipping and merch links, and a minimal API for automation.

versions.notes: LL-HLS preview, multi-destination health, overlay theming.
SRT ingest, setlists, basic tipping links, archive replays.
RTMP ingest, HLS/DASH output, schedule/cards, chat overlay.
